data.englishTranslation: The Prophet (SAW) said: "Whoever prays for Allah's blessings upon me once, will be blessed for it by Allah ten times."
data.arabicVerse: قَالَ ﷺ: «مَنْ صَلَّ عَلَيَّ صَلاةً صَلَّ اللهُ عَلَيْهِ بِهَا عَشَراً»

data.englishTranslation: The Prophet (SAW) said: "Do not make my grave a place of ritual celebration, but pray for Allah's blessings upon me, for your blessings reach me from wherever you are."
data.arabicVerse: قَالَ ﷺ: «لا تَجْعَلُوا قَبْرِيْ عِيْداً وَ صَلُّوا عَلَيَّ فَإِنَّ صَلاتَكُمْ تَبْلُغُنِي حَيْثُ كُنْتُمْ»

data.englishTranslation: The Prophet (SAW) said: "The miser is the one in whose presence I am mentioned yet does not pray for Allah's blessings upon me."
data.arabicVerse: قَالَ ﷺ: «البَخِيْلُ مَنْ ذُكِرْتُ عِنْدَهُ فَلَمْ يُصَلِّ عَلَيَّ»

data.englishTranslation: The Prophet (SAW) said: "Indeed Allah has angels who roam the earth and they convey to me the greetings (or prayers of peace) of my 'ummah (nation)."
data.arabicVerse: قَالَ ﷺ: «إنَّ لِلَّهِ مَلائِكَةً سَيَّا حِيْنَ فِي الأرْضِ، يُبَلِّغُونِي مِنْ أُمَّتِي السَّلامَ»

data.englishTranslation: The Prophet (SAW) said: "No one sends greetings (or prayers of peace) upon me but Allah returns my soul to me so that I may return his greetings."
data.arabicVerse: قَالَ ﷺ: «مَا مِنْ أحَدٍ يُسَلِّمُ عَلَيَّ، إلَّا رَدَّ اللهُ عَلَيَّ رُوْحي، حَتَّى أرُدَّ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامَ»
